page.title: 09Edendork Co-Op Movement
page.content: In 1964 the{Co-Operative}movement was founded in Edendork by the REV.Austin Eustace and a group of local farmers. Today it is a prosperous thriving community service for farmers within a forty mile radius.The Co-op has two functions. (1)To supply the farmers needs.(2)To use what the farmers produce.The Co-op supplies-{seeds, {chemicals,animal feed stuffs, {fertilizer,light Hardware,veterinary {equipment.} The Co-op is the parent company of 1 OAKDALE BULK MEATS employing 6people 2 OAKDALE BAKERY employing 6 people. The products are tarts,sausage rolls, Cornish Pasties,shortbread,gravy rings and apple squares. 3 THOMPSON MEATS employing 7 people-a butcher's shop in Downpatrick. 4 TYRONE CRYSTAL the world famous lead crystal employing 110 people.
